title: China price-list compound expansion added
summary: Added dedicated guide coverage for compounds listed in the provided WWB China price list PDF, including peptide, oral, and injectable-catalog entries with citations and safety framing.

title: Dedicated guide architecture launched
summary: Published individual URLs for compounds and minerals, replaced anchor-only learn cards, and enabled search/filter in the Learn directory.

title: External citation framework added
summary: Added inline citation markers and source blocks for dosing and safety claims, including FDA/DailyMed, ClinicalTrials, PubMed, and NIH ODS references.

title: Experimental risk labeling standardized
summary: Added prominent status badges and caution sections for experimental, discontinued, and region-limited therapies.

title: Micronutrient expansion released
summary: Added a comprehensive mineral set with consistency checks for dosing-language citations and provider-question structure.
